title: What will Thunderbird do if folder will be deleted?
content:
What will Thunderbird do if I delete a folder which sorting rule in Thunderbird should move message? I need an answer which actual for Thunderbird versions 40 and higher. Thanks.

I have rule to move messages from Inbox to user created folder. I want to move all messages from this folder and delete empty folder. How will work work? Will stay messages in Inbox? Yes I want to stay messages in Inbox.

Why can I not delete rule? There are case when I have no access to machine with Thunderbird and rule, when I use browser to manage my mailbox.

title: Compact Junk & Trash
content:
Windows 11 Thunderbird 128.5.0esr (64-bit)

I compact JUNK by right click "Empty Junk" / "Compact"

I compact TRASH by right click "Empty Trash"

File "Compact Folders"

This process used to show me how much space I am saving - I do not see this number anymore.

title: Only parts of RSS feeds get downloaded
content:
Hi,

on Thunderbird 115.16.3 (32 bit) I have a problem: only approximately the first half of the RSS feeds I've set up get downloaded.

Download always stops at the same feed.

The other don't: I have for each one to right click and choose download.

This happen since last, last by one or last by two updates: I'm not sure. Before it worked perfectly. I've cleaned the startup cache, but the behavior is still the same.

How can I solve the problem?

Thanks

Suppongo sia stato un virus..specifico per questa applicazione o un baco/incompatibilità con gli ultimi aggiornamenti. Quest'ultima opzione mi sembra la più probabile, visto che all'inizio mi bastava spostare un folder di mail per veder riapparire tutto il contenuto...ora no. title: Duplicate email
content:
Somehow, I now have a duplicate email account. Changes to either one are reflected in the other account. So if I delete one, the other one will be duplicated. Also recently, each received email is duplicated.

I can live with each duplicated email but would like to get rid of the duplicated account.

Thanks, Sue
creator: kentuckysue

title: Thunderbird Schlagwörter werden nicht mehr übertragen
content:
Hallo und guten Tag, ich habe seit Ende September ein großes Problem. Wir sind 3 Personen die zusammen auf einen Emailaccount zugreifen. Bisher haben wir Schlagwörter nutzen können um den anderen mitzuteilen, dass die Email bearbeitet wurde usw. Nun synchronisieren die Schlagwörter nicht mehr und alles versinkt im Chaos. Können Sie mir helfen? Gibt es eine Einstellung die ich machen muss? Emailaccount ist bei Ionos.

Viele Grüße und einen schönen Tag noch. Romy
creator: romyspost

title: Deactivating a POP account without deleting it
content:
This question was asked some years ago. The answers then, were all based on going to Account Settings>Server Settings and unchecking everything. This no longer works. (Current TB version: 128.x (64-bit).

Another solution offered was to copy everything to Local folders and delete the old account. This solution is not satisfactory, since I create an archive account each year.

Until about two years ago, I just added a copy of the account to be archived as a new account and deactivated it. This would be the ideal solution.

Is there an up to date solution to this problem?
creator: daniel_f

title: pasting screenshots
content:
When trying to paste a screenshot from my PC (Windows 11), it fails—it does nothing. I've been attempting to set 'mail.compose.attach_http_images' to true and selecting "Only HTML" in the "Compose messages in HTML format" settings, but it still doesn't work. However, the screenshot from the clipboard can be successfully pasted into the Paint app.

Do you have any ideas or suggestions for resolving this issue?
creator: shalev.g

title: Message filters have stopped working on two separate machines.
content:
I have Moz on two separate machines; one a Lenovo laptop Win10, the other a Lenovo desk top Win8. My message filters have stopped working. I can't tell if it's all or some, as I have 30 or more on each one. All I know is, my inbox is full of spam and messages supposed to be auto-moved to sub folders are still present. Furthermore when troubleshooting this, manually running both existing and new filters simply does nothing.

What can I do?
creator: tomjvv

title: Thunderbird sends mail from gmail but saves to sent folder of outlook mail when trying to send from outlook
content:
For my school account (outlook) when trying to send an email thunderbird does not send the mail from my school account but from my gmail account. Thunderbird also saves the email to the sent folder of my school account (which didn't happen at first but I messed about to make it happen, I'll explain) but does not save the email to my gmail sent folder.

To get the email to save to my school sent folder which is called "Sent Items" I made a new folder in thunderbird called "cheese" and renamed it to "Sent Items" before going into the account settings and setting the copy to save all emails sent from my school email to "Sent Items".

I then didn't do anything to the default "Sent" folder that thunderbird had created but it disappeared after I tried dragging the emails from that folder into the "new" "Sent Items".

Versions: Thunderbird: 128.5.0esr (64-bit)

OS: Edition Windows 10 Pro Version 22H2 Installed on ‎2022-‎09-‎03 OS build 19045.5131 Experience Windows Feature Experience Pack 1000.19060.1000.0
creator: huldarh
